outputs.output_descr: The project will contribute to meet the needs of the rural populations facing poverty in terms of improving access to potable water in the regions of intervention . It will improve the maintenance of boreholes and basic sanitation services. The project will also empower women and girls by alleviating their heavy workload caused by water scarcity and reinforcing the technical capacities of the community in integrated water resources management thus directly contributing to the attainment of the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs).

project_title: Système Intégré d'Approvisionnement en Eau Potable
